name: Ecchi Jack
description:
Welcome to the Casino XXX! Cute girls are ready to serve you. You can play blackjack, chat with girls, or even undress them. Search for the key to get intimate with a girl. Or just stare at her chest.

Toya Arai is a college student. He wants to be a yakuza and he has a trial task to enter the clan. He must find a girl with a mole on her… very intimate place. Why the clan needs her? He doesn’t know. The important thing is that, if he finds her, he can turn his dream into reality.

Features:
  • What are girls thinking? It’s a secret. But not for Toya. Get intimate with girls and they help you to play.
  • 3 dealer girls, each with her own story and individuality. But behind the pretty face, you could find a monster. Your communication skills are very important.
  • Free camera mode. It lets you search for the mole in the most interesting places. Or you can watch a girl dancing from many angles.
  • High bets. The most private rewards are expensive, play risky!


Ami Hara is a bright, cheerful girl. She boasts beauty and is good at sport. But something is bothering her. Does she hide something or is she just too hungry?

Ren Igarashi - an experienced, ambitious, and rich lady. But why does she work in such a strange casino? In her eyes, you are just a little boy. Prove her wrong!

Naoko Murakami - the soul of the casino. Kind, charming, and cute, but sometimes with a sadness in her wide eyes. Are you going to be just another client to her? Or, could you be something more?
